fields.name: Number Puzzles
fields.description: Here you will find many thousands of number puzzles, mostly with solutions, all free of charge. Most types of puzzles can be solved online / interactively. Number puzzles mostly follow abstract rules and can be solved with logic alone. Some types of puzzles also require elementary mathematics (basic arithmetic operations).

fields.name: Sudoku
fields.description: Sudoku (数 独, Number Place) is a logic puzzle: A number has to be entered in each field, whereby each number must appear exactly once in each row, column and in each area. - Solve many puzzles interactively / online or print them out, with solutions, different levels of difficulty and diagram sizes, solution techniques, links, literature.
